items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

items.title: Performance
items.description: For sport/luxury vehicles and high-speed handling

items.title: Touring
items.description: For durability and smooth long rides

items.title: Summer
items.description: For dry roads and warm, arid climates

items.title: All Weather
items.description: Combines an All Season and Winter tire traits for strong traction year-round

items.title: UHP
items.description: Used on sports and super cars in warm weather, sporty handling, and quick acceleration

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 205-70r15 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 205-70r15 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 205/70R15 Tire Size
205/70R15 tires are fitted to passenger cars, CUVs, SUVs, and light trucks, and are available in various tire categories such as All-Season, Winter, All-Weather, Ultra-High-Performance, and many more. Commonly used on popular vehicles from the 80s, 90s, and 2000s, 205/70R15 tires can be found on the Buick Century, Dodge Caliber, Honda CR-V, Pontiac Grand Prix, or Toyota Sienna, and a new version of any of these vehicles might’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of General Ameri G4S, Dunlop SP 50, [Bridgestone Dueler H/T 684](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/dueler-h-t-684), or Firestone FR680 02 tires attached. 

Popular vehicles include
1997-2005 Buick Century
2007-2012 Dodge Caliber
1997-2004 Honda CR-V
1991-2003 Pontiac Grand Prix
1998-2003 Toyota Sienna

 All-season tires can perform in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions, making them a popular choice for drivers. Have a look at the [Yokohama Avid Ascend LX](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/avid-ascend-lx#v=1&tireSize=205-70r15&mpn=110132806&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=190478&curationSource=none&productPos=26), General Altimax RT43, and Nexen N’Priz AH5 if you need a 205/70R15 sized all-season tire that can offer year-round traction.

Winter tires are engineered for superior braking and cornering in winter temperatures and conditions like snow, ice, slush and even cold, and dry asphalt. Consider buying the [Continental VikingContact 7](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/vikingcontact-7#v=1&tireSize=205-70r15&mpn=03452370000&pageSource=sizeCatalog&itemId=186335&curationSource=none&productPos=5), Hankook Winter i*Pike X (W429A), and Kumho Wintercraft Ice WI31 if you need a 205/70R15 sized winter tire for excellent performance during the winter season.

Whether you drive a Dodge Caliber, Honda CR-V, Toyota Sienna, or something else, SimpleTire has a wide range of 205/70R15 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
